title: E-Commerce Entrepreneurship Training Program for Adolescents

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and internet usage experience
context.additional_context: Includes e-commerce data analysis activities linked to mathematics curriculum. Conducting individual practical exercises in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain basic web system concepts required for e-commerce platform operations through mathematical data analysis
Learners can design online business models through a 3+ stage market research process
Learners can successfully complete virtual product sales simulations at over 80% proficiency using digital toolkits provided in the LMS
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
